snippet: The league cut the suspensions of Scott Fujita and Anthony Hargrove by two games and one game, respectively, but kept in place the longest suspension of a full season for Jonathan Vilma.
abstract: National Football League reissues player suspensions in the New Orleans Saints bounty case; slightly reduces the discipline for linebacker Scott Fujita and defensive end Anthony Hargrove but keeps in place the longest of a full season for linebacker Jonathan Vilma.
lead_paragraph: The league cut the suspensions of Scott Fujita and Anthony Hargrove by two games and one game, respectively, but kept in place the longest suspension of a full season for Jonathan Vilma.

headline.seo: N.F.L. Slightly Reduces Two Player Suspensions in Bounty Case
headline.main: N.F.L. Slightly Reduces Two Bounty Suspensions
